content: विघट् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be disunited or separated. {@--2@} To be spoiled or ruined. {@--3@} To be stopped, break down. {@--4@} To assume various shapes; <ls>Māl. 9. 24.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To separate, disperse, tear apart; विघटयंत्यग्रेनभोंऽभोमुचः <ls>Māl. 5. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To remove, displace.
